talk0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0301>You discovered the shrine already? Before
I imparted my words of guidance?<sp:0:4:0>Well. This is embarrassing. I have nothing
else of use to tell you.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:TalkPositive_00>I should have spoken up. Apologies.
talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL>Magnificent. You have discovered the
sacred shrine.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Ease>This means that the task I was given is
complete. It has taken a long time. But I
have done it at last.
talk0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting>Thank you for returning to the land of
my sacred shrine.
talk0000:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Welcome.<sp:5:0:0> On this land sits the sacred
shrine entrusted to me.
talk0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Happy>My task is complete now that you have
discovered the shrine.

My next directive begins now. <sp:5:0:0>I will watch
over this sacred shrine.
talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease>My task is to guide visitors toward the
<clr:0000>sacred shrine<clr:ffff> with these words:

<sp:3:0:2:0801>"Give keys born of water to the three
altars.<sp:5:0:0> The sacred shrine will appear."<sp:0:4:0><snd:TalkPositive><clr:0000>Water can sometimes change its form.<clr:ffff>
I hope my meaning is clear.
talk0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>I believed my destiny was nullified when
this land fell to the surface.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>It was therefore fortunate that I fell to
this precise spot. I can still fulfill my task.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000>What is that task?<sp:5:0:0> To give visitors in this
land particular words of guidance.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>"Give keys born of water to the three
altars. The sacred shrine will appear."
talk0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Heed these words and offer keys to all
three altars to reveal the sacred shrine.
